{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3477365,"name":"Jackson","username":"Jacksjnfds","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/j/43a26b/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-01-09T22:54:42.595Z","cooked":"

The april tags gets highlighted and displays its IDs, but doesn’t change the variables or the visualizer at all. I haven’t updated the any program or the Limelight itself since 2024. Does anyone know how to solve this problem?

Have you followed all the steps here?

docs.limelightvision.io

Tracking AprilTags | Limelight Documentation

AprilTags are tracked using the standard "tx", "ty", and "ta" values. No code changes are required to upgrade a color/retroreflective tracking robot to apriltags.

Do you have an April Tag Field Map uploaded? Do your test tags match the map placement?
